page.t: color: defines the color of the separation line
size: :defines the size of the line ( PDF in milimetres )
space: defines the space that will be truncated the line
line: defines how long the line have to been truncated
the easy way to do that is simply Code: <sep/>
Now with a weight and color :) Code: <sep color="blue" size="10"/>
with line and space Code: <sep color="red" size="4" space="4" line="6" />
